name: sunshine
description: Sunshine is a self-hosted game streaming host that works with Moonlight and similar clients. It captures and streams your desktop or games with low-latency encoding.
features: Game streaming: Streams PC games to Moonlight clients on various devices.
Low latency: Optimizes encoding and network protocols for minimal input lag.
Hardware encoding: Leverages NVENC, AMF, or QuickSync for efficient video encoding.
HDR support: Streams HDR content to compatible displays and clients.
Multi-client: Streams to multiple devices simultaneously or sequentially.
Controller support: Passes through gamepad input from remote clients.
Audio streaming: Routes game audio to remote devices with low latency.
Resolution scaling: Adjusts stream resolution based on client capabilities and bandwidth.
Wake-on-LAN: Wakes host PC remotely for streaming sessions.
Web interface: Configures settings through browser-based admin panel.
Custom apps: Defines custom applications and games for streaming.
Authentication: Secures access with PIN codes and client pairing.
